title-group.article-title: A Method for Solving Nonlinear Volterra Integral Equations of the Second Kind

abstract.p: The approach given in this paper leads to numerical methods for Volterra integral equations which avoid the need for special starting procedures. Formulae for a typical fourth-order method are derived and some numerical examples presented. A convergence theorem is given for the method described.
